CompanyDescription:
Limelight provides digital content delivery, online video delivery, cloud
security, edge computing, and cloud storage services. Limelight's edge services
platform includes a globally distributed, high-performance private network,
intelligent software, and support services.
The services we provide help our customers optimize and deliver digital content
to a wide variety of digital devices. These services provide advanced features
to enable digital workflows for live and on-demand video publishing, online
gaming, content distribution, and website and web application acceleration.
Limelight services incorporate content and application security, video
transformation, distributed storage functionality, and the analytics and
reporting associated with them.
